start_date.description: Unix timestamp representing the start date of the first slot

end_date.description: Unix timestamp representing the end date of the first slot

periodic_end_date.description: Unix timestamp representing the end date of the periodic booking. Either periodic_end_date or occurrences must be filled

periodicity.description: Bookings are repeated every periodicity week

occurrences.description: The periodic booking ends after n occurrences. Either periodic_end_date or occurrences must be filled

iana.description: IANA identifier of the booking owner

days.description: Array of booleans, representing selected days. Index 0 corresponds to Sunday, index 1 to Monday, etc
